players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm shocked by Charlie's sudden death. We need to stay focused and work together to identify the culprit."
Bob: "I agree Alice, Charlie's death is terrible. We need to be very careful about who we trust. Does anyone have any information that might help us figure out who did this?"
Diana: "I believe we should focus our investigation on Bob, given that he was the last one to interact with Charlie before his death."

Bob: "Diana, that's a serious accusation without any real evidence. I'm just as concerned about finding Charlie's killer as everyone else. What makes you so certain it was me? Do you have information the rest of us don't?"
Diana: "Bob, I have concrete evidence that implicates you in Charlie's murder. I found a bloody knife with your prints on it near the scene of the crime."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
